title: Chinese President Xi Jinping vows to pursue 'reunification' with Taiwan by peaceful means
content:
1. Chinese President Xi Jinping vows to pursue 'reunification' with Taiwan by peaceful means  CNN
  2. China warns US following reports Marines are training Taiwanese forces  Yahoo News
  3. Former Australian PM Abbott calls for solidarity with Taiwan  Associated Press
  4. Opinion | What if, instead of confronting China's rise, we must manage its decline?  The Washington Post
  5. Are Chinese incursions into Taiwan's air defense zone a prelude to war? | TheHill  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国の習近平国家主席、平和的手段で台湾との「統一」を追求すると宣言
中国国家主席习近平誓言以和平方式追求与台湾的 "统一"。
中國國家主席習近平誓言以和平方式追求與臺灣的 "統一"。
